articles.description: The German discounter, which employs a total of over 25,000 people in the UK, said  its 1,800 office-based employees will also receive a £100 bonus.
articles.content:
Lidl will hand out a one-off bonus of £200 to its supermarkets staff, cleaners, warehouse staff and customer assistants as a 'thank you' for their hard work during the pandemic.

articles.title: 160 jobs to go at Nissan Sunderland plant as challenges continue for car makers - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Automotive giant says it is consulting with office-based staff as it seeks to make its operations more efficient
articles.content:
More than 150 roles are set to be lost at Nissans Sunderland plant as it continues to grapple with a tough automotive market.
